c_id.D_ID: D_ID in (select D_ID from jsharmony.D where jsharmony.D.C_ID=@datalock_c_id or D_SCOPE='S')
c_id.D_SCOPE_ID: (((D_SCOPE = 'S' or D_SCOPE = 'C') and D_SCOPE_ID=@datalock_c_id) or (D_SCOPE='E' and D_SCOPE_ID in (select E_ID from E where E.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)))
c_id.N_ID: N_ID in (select N_ID from jsharmony.N where jsharmony.N.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)
c_id.N_SCOPE_ID: ((N_SCOPE = 'C' and N_SCOPE_ID=@datalock_c_id) or (N_SCOPE='E' and N_SCOPE_ID in (select E_ID from E where E.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)))
c_id.PE_ID: PE_ID in (select PE_ID from jsharmony.CPE where jsharmony.CPE.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)
c_id.CPER_ID: CPER_ID in (select CPER_ID from jsharmony.CPER inner join jsharmony.CPE on jsharmony.CPE.PE_ID=jsharmony.CPER.PE_ID where jsharmony.CPE.C_ID=@datalock_c_id)
